post.body: The difference is govt control.
How do explain global warming when it snowed inNOLA, yesterday?
depends on the client.
U only have urself to blame. At least u can sneak a few of her cookies.
Oh good lord, that is like some1 ordering 3 Big Macs, but don't my diet coke.
because u are such great company or they know abt those wild parties u throw when they r sleeping
Do tell. I never understood the words swapped @starbucks.
R u serious abt them charging extra for more than 4 words?
Did someone say shoes? SHOES!
It was the dems on tv complaining abt the reps not playing along with thebank bailout. And the dems are in control of Congress
Did u fall down and mack ur head? How qickly u want to rewrite history.
Pontchartrain is th sous chef?
Power naps does a body good. Drool not so much for ur rep.
What jail, ur, high school you were released from? Had to be different since everyone beat me to the punch.
I survived the drive, but not the headache
That is one loud drink.
I would be more than happy to get you some ice cream, if it means you finish your Journey story for us. It may take awhile,tho
Then we would have to nag the hubs to get rid of the bodies.
Want some company on ur trip? I could do with a vacay from reality.
I don't. I think the kids and hubs would vote me off the island. :)
That doesn't count.
@NOLAnotes And now you know why I warned against those damn gingerbread house. Altho, next year we go in together, do the TRAIN!
Besides, most of what the kids want is fleeting.
It seemed at one pt whenever we were in a store Amber got stuff. The house was crowded and she didn't play most of it.
@akaMonty Also, learning not to give into the tantrums. I have no problem pushing a screaming child out of the toy section.
& @liprap Happy Hannukah, ya'll!
No, she is 6 yr old. And I guess we embarrassed her by saving her life. :)
I can't believe what this economy has reduced me to doing.
Well, that was kinda werid experience.
I just joined the nolatweeple Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/nolatweeple and you can too. Please Retweet.
What is wrong with this boy? He is constantly eating.
Listen up, kids! I am not ur flight attendant. There will be no serving of snacks and drinks, unless u want to DIE!
So not looking forward to making next week's menu. Nothing is appealing to me.
ok *bux has to have some Christmas non coffee drink.
Or maybe that is just what us public schoolers say.
Dinner is saved. Wish I could say as much for my patience with all this crap breaking.
Do computer menus on the phone really save time or just piss off the customer? I am going with pissed off.
Grease is the word!
think my crockpot is broken. 2 things could happen: the house catches on fire or cold potato soup.
I guess all these school zones are just sggestions.
It is easy to say u want it that way when u are not doing the foot work.
Manhattan blvd is totally screwed. stay away!
Srsly going to puke in the toy section of Target.
I AM FED THE HELL UP!!!!
Vieux Carre Comission sucks! They r causing us to lose money.
I hate this, I get full fast, but know I will hungry in abt an hour. Doesn't matter what I eat.
My no stress baking theory was good, but I forgot to factor in the kids. Why can't THEY JUST LISTEN!!!
It is official, the kids really start getting on my nerves at the noon hour. When does school start, again.
It is so nice to not be up at 530am or driving anyone to school. Still in pjs and relaxing.
The older I get the more scared I get of bridges, especially the long ones.
Amber wants to be a mini Aunt NOLAnotes. Someone help me. :)
RTNOLAnews JPSO warns about credit card phone scam http://tinyurl.com/8nxlj
Passing the Copeland house. The lights are up.
Not many Christmas lights out this year. Recession or loss of Christmas spirit?
So how's the weather treatin' ya? Like a cheap hooker with a short attention span.
Now, we can watch Tv while pumping gas.
All because I crave whatever I see. Damn you nacho commericals!
Then Amber says we embarrassed her. Now, Sam claims his is going to "frow up". *sigh*
So the dventure goes: stop a Taco Bell. Amber chokes on peppermint. Dad performs you know. Amber looks like she is going to puke.
Santa spotted at da Rite Aid on Jeff hwy.
